message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product, and I would like to propose a price of $125.

I like your persistence, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm offering it to you for $127.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it!
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I am willing to pay $126 for the product.
I appreciate your patience, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $128. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I am willing to pay $127 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $128, but I need to make a bit more than that. I can offer it to you for $129. That's as low as I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to pay $128 for the product.
